++ Pre Mixed Break Fast Food Recipe

INSTRUCTIONS
1. First Mix in the dry mix and grind it up together. If this stuff is preground that is preferable:
    * FlaxSeed
    * [Almond]
    * [Oats] (or add at the end)
    * (1tsp)[Cacao]
    * HempSeed
2. Next Mix in the wet stuff:
    * (3)[Date]
    *  MapleSyrup
    * (1/4-1/3)[Banana]
    * PeanutButter
    * AlmondButter

3. Lastly add some oats if you didnt add them at the beginning.:
    * [Oats]
